summary: (Korean with English subtitles) Korean's President organizes a nationwide "Kimchi Contest." Brother and sister: Jang-eun and Sung-Chan join the competition, both using their mother's recipe... See full summary Â»

title: Sik-gaek: Kim-chi-jeon-jaeng
